definitions.definition: Relating to what follows the modern era.
Of, relating to, or having the characteristics of postmodernism , especially as represented in art , architecture , literature , science , or philosophy that reacts against an earlier modernism .

main_definition: ( literally ) Relating to what follows the modern era. [1919 ]
secondary_definitions: Of, relating to, or having the characteristics of postmodernism , especially as represented in art , architecture , literature , science , or philosophy that reacts against an earlier modernism .
